title: Barça Better than Real?
description:
The FC crew react to Robert Lewandowski's Barcelona introduction in Miami, and how the Polish star will fit with the team alongside his new supporting cast. Plus, how Bayern Munich will look like without their leading scorer. Also, the guys argue who the most complete footballer of all time is.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Raphinha proclaims Barça are better than Real; Robert Lewandowski officially introduced as a Barcelona player; Spurs title chances
